oracle.apps.saf.ta.jaudit.core
Class SafRule

java.lang.Object
  oracle.jdeveloper.audit.extension.ExtensionBean
      oracle.jdeveloper.audit.analyzer.Rule
          oracle.apps.saf.ta.jaudit.core.SafRule

public class SafRule
extends oracle.jdeveloper.audit.analyzer.Rule

The SafRule must be used by analyzers using SAF instead of Rule. Usage of this rule allows the automatic population of the rule's localization properties via the @RuleResources annotation.

See Also:
RuleResources
